name: FatEX | Smart Body Fat Percent assistant
description: [Feature list] What can I do for you? 1.Measure your body fat percent This app need to work with hardware, measure the thickness of 3 or 7 folds under skin, then calculate your body fat percent.  2.Show the historical data as a chart Save the measure data,provide daily,weekly,monthly,yearly category, you can easily to find lose weight recently.  [Differentiation] Whats special?  The hardware is very small, you can hold it in your hand.  The hardware provide chargeable battery, more environmentally friendly.  Fashion User interface, provide light and dark theme  [User Story] Why you need it?  (Fitness) When get up in the morning, take two or less minutes to measure your body fat percent, easily to manage your healthy.  (Heath Examination) Its easy to measure body fat percent via this way, no need to use expensive and large equipment.  (Family) Measure body fat percent for every family member, always pay attention to health.  Tips  For the hardware, please contact the support email to get it.  Only Android 5.0 is supported.  If you have any questions or feedback, please send an email to 1001tvs.nero@gmail.com.  Please do not use reviews to report issues because we are unable to help you or contact you.
